explains: v. 使恐慌（panic 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.en: I panicked, I cried—the whole ball of wax.
sentences.cn: 我惊慌失措，我大喊大叫—什么反应都有。

sentences.en: Guests panicked and screamed when the bomb exploded.
sentences.cn: 炸弹爆炸的时候，客人们惊慌失措，惊声尖叫。

sentences.en: Her owner Mike Holden panicked and called the coastguard.
sentences.cn: 她的主人迈克·霍尔登惊慌失措，打给了海岸警卫队。
